name: Out Of Ctrl (NiceNChrispy)
description:
Out Of CTRL is a puzzle game where the player can only press inputs when they have the ability to use them. Each level will give the player a time/press allowance for the movement keys, unique to each level.

Players will encounter power ups that will change the way you play. Figuring out the optimal way through and getting your timings perfect is key.

Controls

A/D - Move Left/Right

Space - Jump

When wall jumping you do not need to hold a direction button to jump in that direction. It will automatically choose jump direction. Only need to press space.

 

Credits

Chris Youles - Programmer (@NiceNChrispy)

David Greedy - Programmer (@DavidGreedy)

Art was heavily inspired by the fantastic platformer set https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas

We would have just used it, but we wanted to do the art ourselves too. We aren’t very good.
